newfeatures_features_1_description: Allow users to upload their own videos.
newfeatures_features_2_description: Allow users to edit their own videos.
newfeatures_features_4_description: Allow users to upload files on a Cloud Sharing Service.
newfeatures_features_5_description: Allow users to publish their own games.
newfeatures_features_6_description: Allow users to ask for a refund for the product that they will buy.
newfeatures_features_7_description: Allow users to contact a fast Support Service.
newfeatures_features_8_description: Allow user to hold conversations in the form of posted messages.
newfeatures_features_9_description: Allow users to select a fast shipping service.
newfeatures_features_10_description: Adds Social Media Support to every platform.
newfeatures_features_features_info: Hey there, welcome to the New Features mod. This mod has been created for my framework mod and it will add 7 features in order to fill the 15 features slots. Make sure you download the framework!
